## âœ… Requirements Checklist

Please confirm the app meets ALL these requirements:

- [ ] Built with native macOS frameworks (Swift/SwiftUI/AppKit/Objective-C)
- [ ] NOT an Electron app or web wrapper
- [ ] Lightweight and fast (doesn't use excessive resources)
- [ ] Actively maintained (updated within last 2 years)
- [ ] Currently available for download
- [ ] Works on currently supported macOS versions
- [ ] Not already listed in the README
- [ ] No malware, adware, or suspicious behavior
- [ ] I am not the developer (unless it's truly exceptional)

---

**Note:** Apps that don't meet the native requirement will not be added. When in doubt, check if the app uses Swift/AppKit or if it's just a web wrapper.
